summary: "Mein Kampf" is a book written by Adolf Hitler in 1925 while he was in prison. It's about his life, political beliefs, and plans for Germany. The book was originally written in two parts and became popular when Hitler became leader of Germany. After Hitler died, the German government controlled the book's copyright to prevent its spread. Recently, in 2016, the book was republished in Germany with notes from scholars, causing debate. A French edition was also released in 2021.
title: Mein Kampf
